name: Speed Car: City Driving Sim
description:
A heavy traffic & highway traffic games, car driving! Enjoy this street racing in car games that allows you to drift car in city with crazy traffic coming your way. Speed Car: City Driving Sim where you can show your racing fever to the traffic drive that is coming your way. Be sure to wear your seat belt when you are drift car racing games in the car traffic games.


Features:
- High-definition 3D graphics
- not the same speed experience
- realistic engine sound
- Real music and sound make you feel the real car
- Easy game, so you can ease the fatigue of the day
